Html:
Is it possible generate a QR code in Framework 1.1 application?

How can i do?, Because, my application was develop in this framework.

Thanks for your help. :)

I'm not sure if it can be compiled under 1.1 or not. Do you want to grab source code and try compile it?

Some of stuff you might not need, like WPF and winform. You can remove them from source code. Once QrCode is generated you can paint yourself from bit matrix.
